fire-from-heaven.context: God answers with fire on Mount Carmel
fire-from-heaven.english: Then the fire of the LORD fell

how-long-limping.context: Elijah's challenge to Israel at Carmel
how-long-limping.hebrew: עַד מָתַי אַתֶּם פֹּסְחִים עַל שְׁתֵּי הַסְּעִפִּים
how-long-limping.english: How long will you go limping between two opinions?

lord-he-is-god.english: The LORD, He is God! The LORD, He is God!

still-small-voice.context: God speaks to Elijah in a whisper

i-alone-am-left.english: I alone am left, and they seek my life

chariot-of-fire.english: Elijah went up by a whirlwind into heaven

no-rain.hebrew: אִם יִהְיֶה הַשָּׁנִים הָאֵלֶּה טַל וּמָטָר כִּי אִם לְפִי דְבָרִי
no-rain.english: There shall be neither dew nor rain these years, except by my word
